message: Let's be fair, Bob. This offer leaves us both with a decent amount.
Your cut will be worth less next round, Alice.  Let's settle this now with a reasonable split.
Bob, my friend, you're losing money fast. This is still a good deal for you. Let's be reasonable.
Alice, this back and forth is pointless. I'm offering a fair 50/50 split.  Take it before inflation eats away at your share even more.
